**What type of change does this PR introduce?**

## Checklist

**Before submitting, ensure:**

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed commented-out code and debug statements

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on actual hardware (if firmware changes)
- [ ] I have tested in multiple browsers (if frontend changes)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added inline code comments where necessary

### Git

- [ ] My commits are atomic and have descriptive messages
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the main branch
- [ ] I have resolved all merge conflicts
- [ ] I have squashed commits if requested
